Armenia: Mongol Invasion of Anatolia, much of the sedentary population of Armenia is slaughtered. (to 1244)
France: Louis IX announced that the County of Poitiers would go to his brother Alphonse – offending Isabella of Angoulême, whose son would have inherited the territory had the English won the Battle of Bouvines.
Germany: Lübeck and Hamburg formed an alliance.
Poland: Death of Henry II the Pious
